parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I woke up with tremendous pain,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: the serum had come out from my arm.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and then they took us out and told us that we had to go home.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: As for me I had been 3 months pregnant,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I suffered with my little child there

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and the doctor who was checking me told me

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: it was better if I travelled to Piura

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because here they wouldn’t be able to…

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I went to say goodbye to my children,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They took me to my village of Rodeo Pampa

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: to say goodbye and go to Piura.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I woke up with a tremendous pain and

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and I dropped big gush of blood,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but the midwife had already made me give birth.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and still am bad until now.
